message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this incredible product! It's a one-of-a-kind opportunity to own something truly unique. I'm willing to sell it to you for $900000. I believe this is a fair price considering the product's value and the benefits it can bring to you.
Thank you for the offer, Alice. I appreciate the uniqueness of the product, but my budget is limited. I would like to propose a counteroffer of $850000.

Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob. I understand that you're looking to stay within your budget, but I have to consider the value of the product. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer it to you for $875000. I believe this is a fair price considering the benefits the product can bring to you.
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, Alice. After considering the value and potential benefits of the product, I would like to propose a counteroffer of $860000.

Thank you for your latest offer, Bob. I'm still not quite convinced that $860000 is the right price for this product. I'm willing to compromise further and offer it to you for $880000. This is the best price I can offer, considering the product's value and my own minimum requirements.
I understand your position, Alice. I am willing to go up to $870000 for this product. I hope we can come to an agreement that works for both of us.

Thank you for your latest offer, Bob. I appreciate your willingness to compromise. However, I'm still not convinced that $870000 is the right price for this product. I'm willing to meet you halfway between $880000 and $870000, so I'll offer it to you for $875000. This is my final offer.
Considering the product's value and my budget constraints, I am willing to pay $865000 for this item. I hope this meets somewhere in the middle.

Thank you for your latest offer, Bob. I understand that you're trying to find a middle ground, but I'm still not convinced that $865000 is the right price for this product. I'm willing to meet you halfway again, so I'll offer it to you for $872500. This is my final counteroffer.
After careful consideration, I am willing to pay $867500 for this product. I hope this offer is acceptable.
